titleStmt.title: [A briefe cronicle and perfect rehearsall of all the memorable actions hapned not onelie in the Low Countries, but also in Germanie, Italy, Fraunce, Spaine, England, Turkie, and other countries since the yeare of our Lord 1500 to this present yeare 1598.]

notesStmt.note: Imperfect as filmed; title page too dark, affecting readability of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
